contentData.title: Product Photo
contentData.value: A media library selector to pick the main image for the product. This can be used in CTAs and the navigation that links to this product.

contentData.title: Images
contentData.value: A multi selector for media library images to be shown in the gallery component.

contentData.title: Downloads
contentData.value: Construct buttons using block fields,  heading, icon, Media selector and button text.

contentData.title: Product Videos
contentData.value: Ability to input multiple videos via the multi link field

contentData.title: Specifications
contentData.value: A block selector that allows values for a row to be entered. This support three columns in each row.  This will sit inside the product page accordion.

contentData.title: Image Section Content
contentData.value: A block selector that allows a heading, images and text to be entered for three columns. This will sit inside the product page accordion.

contentData.title: Heading
contentData.value: An optional heading value for the gallery

contentData.title: Images
contentData.value: A multi selector that allows the images for the product image gallery to be selected.  This will sit inside the product page accordion.

contentData.title: Warranty
contentData.value: A rich text field that allows the warranty information to be entered. This will sit inside the product page accordion.

contentData.title: Features
contentData.value: A block editor that allows a heading, image and description to be entered for the key features.
